entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Englee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 a.m. NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.0Â°C

Observed at: Englee 3:30 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High zero except plus 3 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero except plus 3 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1 except plus 5 south of Hare Bay. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1 except plus 5 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
